description.et: The whole assessment will be divided into a set of mini-projects involving programming in Python and implementation on the hardware.

grade_preconditions.et:
The course will have three or four projects depending on the schedule and speed of the students. Each project will have a task revolving around perception, planning and control of drones.

The list of tasks/projects will be posted on the moodle soon.

grade_evaluation.et: The students will be graded on how well their implementation performs on the given task.

debt_elimination.et: Individual evaluation schedules can be decided based on the mutual convenience of the students and the instructors.
